      • retryS3Operation

        public static <T> T retryS3Operation(Callable<T> f)
                          throws Exception
        Retries S3 operations that fail due to io-related exceptions. Service-level exceptions (access denied, file not found, etc) are not retried.
        Throws:
        Exception
